|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, crmy, c1), cz))
-| wf(crmy, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat2), cz), cz)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmx, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)))))
-| wf(crmy, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat2), cz), cz)
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmx, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)))))

comment: Special addition-of-1 formula for X sequence. Part 1 of equation 2.9 of [JonesMatijasevic] p. 695. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Oct-2014.)
